dct_title_s: Abriss der Stadt Jerusalem, wie sie f√ºrnemlich zur Zeit dess Herrn Christi beschaften gewesen
dct_description_sm: Central image drawn after Adrichom (1533-1585); vignettes drawn after Villalpando, (1552-1608).
Inset pictorial vignettes depicting figures, calvary path, stations of the cross, buildings, landmarks birds-eye and profile views of the temple, and biblical scenes.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
